pedestals.filter.message_twohanded: Cannot Be Holding Filters in Both Hands for this Action
pedestals.tool_link_network: Cannot be Linked to Another Network
pedestals.pedestal.message_redstone_disa: Redstone Signal Strength Needed to Activate Pedestal:
item.pedestals.tool_linkingtool.descript: §5 Links from the Receiver to the Sender
item.pedestals.tool_linkingtool.interact: §3 Crouch Right Click to select a pedestal. (Crouch Right Click on the ground to deselect)
item.pedestals.tool_linkingtoolbackwards: §5 Links from the Sender to the Receiver
§3 Crouch Right Click to select a pedestal. (Crouch Right Click on the ground to deselect)
item.pedestals.tool_upgradetool.interact: §3 Offhand Left Tool and Left Click to Remove Upgrades, Crouch Right Click in Air to Switch Tool.
item.pedestals.tool_filtertool.interacti: §3 Offhand Left Tool and Left Click to Remove Upgrades, Crouch Right Click in Air to Switch Tool.
item.pedestals.tool_tagtool.interaction: §3 Crouch Right Click in Air to Switch Tool.
item.pedestals.tool_devtool.interaction: §3 Offhand Left Tool and Left Click to Break Pedestals if in Creative Mode
item.pedestals.filter_base.base_descript: THIS FILTER BASE IS JUST A CRAFTING COMPONENT!!!
item.pedestals.filter_base.description: §5 All other Filters: Crouch Right Click on a Chest to Set the Contents as the Filter, Craft to Clear Filter
item.pedestals.filter_base.interaction: §3 Offhand Filter and Right Click to Insert the Filter In Pedestal.
item.pedestals.filter_item.interaction: §3 Offhand Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, Crouch Right Click to switch MODES
item.pedestals.filter_itemstack.interact: §3 Offhand Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, Crouch Right Click to switch MODES
item.pedestals.filter_durability.descrip: §5 This Filter Filters By Item Durability
item.pedestals.filter_durability.interac: §3 Offhand Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, Crouch Right Click to switch MODES
item.pedestals.filter_enchanted.interact: §3 Offhand Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, Crouch Right Click to switch MODES
item.pedestals.filter_enchantedcount.des: §5 This Filter Filters By Enchants on an Item
item.pedestals.filter_enchantedcount.int: §3 Offhand Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES
item.pedestals.filter_enchantedexact.des: §5 This Filter Filters By Enchant Names on Items
item.pedestals.filter_enchantedexact.int: §3 Offhand Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, Crouch Right Click to switch MODES
item.pedestals.filter_enchantedfuzzy.des: §5 This Filter Filters By Specific Enchants on Items
item.pedestals.filter_enchantedfuzzy.int: §3 Offhand Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, Crouch Right Click to switch MODES
item.pedestals.filter_food.description: §5 This Filter Filters out Items the Game Considers Food
item.pedestals.filter_food.interaction: §3 Offhand Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, Crouch Right Click to switch MODES
item.pedestals.filter_mod.description: §5 This Filter Filters By Items From the Same Mod
item.pedestals.filter_mod.interaction: §3 Offhand Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, Crouch Right Click to switch MODES
item.pedestals.filter_restricted.descrip: §5 This Filter Restricts How Many Items a Pedestal Can Hold
item.pedestals.filter_restricted.interac: §3 Offhand Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, Crouch Right Click to switch MODES
item.pedestals.filter_tag.description: §5 This Filter Filters By The Tags on an Item (Items in the filter must be renamed with tag names, like 'forge:stone'
item.pedestals.filter_tag.interaction: §3 Offhand Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, Crouch Right Click to switch MODES
item.pedestals.augment_pedestal_nocollid: Crafted when a Linking Tool is Right Clicked on the ground while paper collides with an animal.
item.pedestals.augment_pedestal_roundrob: Crafted when a Linking Tool is Right Clicked on the ground near paper and parrots.
item.pedestals.augment_pedestal_renderdi: §5 Disables Particles and Item/Upgrade Render on Pedestals.
§3 Offhand Item, Crouch Right Click in Air to Toggle
Crafted when a Linking Tool is Right Clicked on the ground near paper when its raining.
item.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_base.bas: §5 THIS UPGRADE BASE IS JUST A CRAFTING COMPONENT!!!
item.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_base.des: §5 All Other Upgrades: Offhand Upgrade and Crouch Right Click to switch MODES, Offhand Upgrade and Right Click to Insert Into Pedestal
item.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_import.d: §5 Imports from 'Below' Inventory into the Pedestal at a rate of 4 items/ 2 Buckets/ 1000rf/ 10 Levels a second.
item.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_export.d: §5 Exports from Pedestal into the Inventory 'Below' at a rate of 4 items/ 2 Buckets/ 1000rf/ 10 Levels a second.
item.pedestals.applicator.description: §3 Crouch Right Click to Save Color, Right Click to Apply Color, Offhand and Any Placed Crystal Stone Blocks will Place with Current Color.
block.pedestals.block_pedestal.descripti: §5 Can Transport Items, Fluids, Energy, and XP, Drop Speed and Slowness Potions on it for Special Effects - Can be Recolored with Applicator
